overview_of_class: This course will provide an introduction to critical statistical methods for the analysis of linguistic data. Basic concepts and methods will be introduced using simulations. Through a series of laboratory assignments, students will analyze primary linguistic data gathered through multiple methodologies (e.g., questionnaires, reading times, acoustic measurements). Topics will range of simple tests of means (e.g., t-tests) to hierarchical mixed effects regression models.
name: Research Methods in Linguistics
title: WCAS LING 330-0-20 Research Methods in Linguistics
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for students who have taken and passed Ling 250 or 260 or 270, or Cog Sci 210 to register for this course. Otherwise, permission of the instructor is required.
